statements: SELECT * FROM action_plans;
SELECT action_item, responsible_person, due_date FROM action_plans;
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE progress_status = 'Pending';
SELECT action_plan_id, issue_id, action_item, due_date FROM action_plans ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE issue_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE issue_id = 10 AND due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_item, responsible_person FROM action_plans WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT action_item, due_date FROM action_plans WHERE action_item LIKE '%problem%' AND progress_status = 'Open' ORDER BY action_plan_id DESC;
SELECT responsible_person, count(*) AS total_actions FROM action_plans GROUP BY responsible_person HAVING total_actions > 2;
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE issue_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND progress_status IN ('Open', 'In Progress') ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_plans;
SELECT action_description, responsible_person FROM action_plans WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT issue_description, severity FROM governance_issues WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT action_plan_id, action_description, due_date FROM action_plans WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE due_date < CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM action_plans WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe' AND due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_plan_id, action_description, responsible_person FROM action_plans WHERE issue_id = 123 AND due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT ap.action_plan_id, ap.action_description, gi.department FROM action_plans ap INNER JOIN governance_issues gi ON ap.issue_id = gi.issue_id WHERE gi.severity = 'High';
SELECT gi.issue_description, gi.status, ap.responsible_person FROM governance_issues gi LEFT JOIN action_plans ap ON gi.issue_id = ap.issue_id WHERE gi.status = 'Open';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_plans FROM action_plans;
SELECT * FROM action_plan;
SELECT description, due_date FROM action_plan ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT issue_id, description FROM audit_issue WHERE priority = 1;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name FROM internal_audit WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM internal_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM action_plan WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT issue_id, description FROM audit_issue ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT a.action_plan_id, a.description, i.description AS issue_description FROM action_plan a JOIN audit_issue i ON a.issue_id = i.issue_id;
SELECT ai.*, ia.auditor_name FROM audit_issue ai INNER JOIN internal_audit ia ON ai.audit_id = ia.audit_id;

SELECT a.action_plan_id, a.description, i.description AS issue_description, ia.audit_date FROM action_plan a JOIN audit_issue i ON a.issue_id = i.issue_id JOIN internal_audit ia ON i.audit_id = ia.audit_id ORDER BY ia.audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM action_plans;
SELECT assignee, action_description FROM action_plans ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_issues WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT action_description, due_date FROM action_plans WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT audit_date, auditor_name, audit_description FROM internal_audits ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM action_plans;
SELECT issue_id, action_description FROM action_plans WHERE due_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT action_description, due_date FROM action_plans WHERE assignee = 'John Doe';
SELECT a.action_taken, a.completion_status, ap.action_description FROM audit_actions a JOIN action_plans ap ON a.action_plan_id = ap.action_plan_id WHERE a.issue_id = 1;
SELECT aud.auditor_name, aud.audit_description, ap.action_description FROM internal_audits aud JOIN action_plans ap ON aud.audit_id = ap.action_plan_id;
SELECT * FROM ActionPlans;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM Issues;
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT audit_id, auditor, audit_date FROM Audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT action_plan_id, issue_id, department, due_date FROM ActionPlans WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM ActionPlans;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, status FROM Issues WHERE status='Open';
SELECT department_name FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT a.action_plan_id, a.department, a.due_date, i.issue_description FROM ActionPlans a JOIN Issues i ON a.issue_id = i.issue_id;
SELECT audit_id, auditor, audit_date FROM Audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
